Type.Name: DiagnosticsConfigurationHandler

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiagnosticsConfigurationHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: The method is a section handler that participates in the resolution of configuration settings in the <system.diagnostics> Element portion of configuration files.

summary.para: Handles the diagnostics section of configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.para: Paraphrasing the .NET SDK documentation: "This type is for internal use ONLY. Please Ignore it."
We're Mono, so we can do better than that. This creates a new instance of the class.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object Create (object parent, object configContext, System.Xml.XmlNode section);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(object parent, object configContext, class System.Xml.XmlNode section) cil managed

remarks.para: The method populates a with the values obtained from the <system.diagnostics> Element section of a configuration file and returns the hashtable.

summary.para: Parses the configuration settings for the <system.diagnostics> Element section of configuration files.

returns.para: A new configuration object, in the form of a .

Docs.param: The object inherited from the parent path
Reserved. Used in ASP.NET to convey the virtual path of the configuration being evaluated.
The root XML node at the section to handle.
